body.name: Pure Bliss by Similac Infant Formula, Gentle, Easy to Digest, Non-GMO, Powder, 24.7-oz Can, Pack of 6
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 16 hrs 13 mins
features: GENTLE NUTRITION MODELED AFTER BREAST MILK: Pure Bliss by Similac infant formula is thoughtfully crafted nutrition that’s easy to digest and gentle on little tummies
NO ARTIFICIAL GROWTH HORMONES & NON-GMO: Similac is the first leading infant formula brand with no artificial growth hormones. Pure Bliss also has no antibiotics or palmolein oil and is non-GMO
SUPPORTS BRAIN & EYE DEVELOPMENT: Our formula has DHA and ARA to support brain and eye development
STARTS WITH FRESH MILK FROM GRASS-FED COWS: Crafted with milk sourced from family-owned Irish farms where cows have the freedom to graze outdoors
PREFERRED BRAND: Similac is the Number 1 infant formula brand fed in hospitals
body.description: Pure Bliss by Similac* infant formula is gentle nutrition modeled after breast milk that has been imported from Europe since 2016. Our complete nutrition formula contains no artificial growth hormones† or antibiotics and is non-GMO.‡ Pure Bliss also has DHA and ARA, nutrients like those found in breast milk that support brain and eye development. It is crafted with milk sourced from family-owned Irish farms where cows have the freedom to graze outdoors.* Not for infants or children with galactosemia.† No significant difference has been shown between milk derived from rbST-treated and non-rbST-treated cows.‡ Ingredients not genetically engineered.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Imported From Europe Pure Bliss by Similac infant formula is gentle, easy-to-digest nutrition that is modeled after breast milk. Our thoughtfully crafted formula provides complete nutrition that supports baby’s first 12 months. Imported from Europe since 2016, it starts with fresh milk from grass-fed cows that is sourced from family-owned Irish farms. Supports Brain & Eye Development Pure Bliss infant formula with iron provides the nutrition your baby needs from birth to 12 months, with nucleotides to help support the immune system, lutein for eye development, and DHA and ARA to support brain development. Pure Bliss by Similac for Toddlers Pure Bliss by Similac Toddler Drink is thoughtfully crafted nutrition with probiotics. Our toddler drink has 29 key nutrients, as well as DHA and ARA to support brain development.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Similac - A Nourishing and Reliable Choice for Our Little One
reviews.reviewText: As a parent, the health and well-being of my baby is always my top priority, and Similac baby formula has been a game-changer for our family. After trying several different brands, we found that Similac provided the perfect balance of nutrients, taste, and digestibility, ensuring our little one thrives and grows.Similac's commitment to creating a nutritionally complete and scientifically formulated product is evident in the results we've seen with our baby. Since switching to Similac, we've noticed improvements in our baby's overall mood, energy levels, and growth. It's evident that the blend of essential vitamins, minerals, and DHA supports healthy development and immune function, giving us peace of mind knowing our baby is getting the nourishment they need.One of the things that set Similac apart is its focus on addressing common feeding issues. The formula's gentle and easy-to-digest composition has helped alleviate our baby's gas and fussiness, making feeding times more enjoyable for both baby and parents. The fact that it's available in different varieties tailored to specific needs, such as sensitive stomachs or lactose intolerance, truly demonstrates Similac's dedication to accommodating the unique requirements of each baby.As a busy parent, I appreciate Similac's user-friendly packaging and the convenience it offers. The resealable canister ensures the formula stays fresh and the included scoop makes measuring the right amount a breeze. It's the little details like these that make all the difference in our daily routine.Finally, it's worth mentioning the support and resources Similac provides to parents. Their website and customer service team offer invaluable guidance and reassurance, making us feel like we're part of a community that understands our concerns and is genuinely invested in our baby's well-being.In conclusion, Similac baby formula has been a lifesaver for our family. It offers the perfect combination of optimal nutrition, digestibility, and convenience, allowing us to feel confident that our baby is receiving the best possible start in life. We wholeheartedly recommend Similac to other parents seeking a reliable, nourishing, and trustworthy formula for their little ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby Loves this formula!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My baby loves this formula! After all the other formulas we tried out, this is the only one he took to right away! We have been using this since July and have never switched since. Getting this 6 pack definitely helps with having a stash for a little more than a month, given the fact we go through 1 container every week. I recommend this formula to anyone looking to start formula feeding!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Great milk for infant, pre- post pregnant mom, but you have to get in line and wait for this since it is from Ireland, and many educational people would value this and afraid of US infant milks brands. Like my Toddler review for this brand, I like this series better for the taste, values, and quality. Toddler series like a wash down version of this. Couple buck more I get this instead and stock up way in advance.Toddler series is ok and great bargain when 6 of these can is sell for 80$ or so when it is close to expiration. I have also notices but not recommended this milk still fresh and good even after date on can is expired as long as one properly stored. Bc i pick up these infant and toddler pure bliss clearance at walmart for 7$ a can and couldn’t consume by expirations, and i opened after couple years after expired, it is still fresh and good to use. I wouldn’t recommended those, but this is to said the milk quality. Other US made baby milk on the market can’t even stand close to this standard even way far before expiration date and they mostly taste chemicals like raw crush vitamin milk mixed in dilute milk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This formula doesn’t have a weird smell and my baby seems to like it. He can finish the bottle everytime I gave him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle on tummy
reviews.reviewText: I started with breastmilk, then I gave him Gerber good start soothe pro. I thought the soothe pro was easier on his tummy than my milk, but then I tried this and this is the winner of all 3 options. Obviously everyone’s different but this seems to be very gentle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Best formula I used for my infant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2020
reviews.reviewText: We've tried 5-6 formulas with our last baby and this is the one that was magic. She immediately stopped spitting up. I've referred this to so many friends because it is not one of the "mainstream" ones you see front and center and so helpful when you find the right formula for your little one. I had another baby and 4 years later I am so thankful this is still being sold with the same formula.Another difference is this doesn't stink like other formulas do. The others seem to have such a distance and artificial smell. This hardy has a smell at all. It doesn't clump and is super easy to mix. Not sure why this is not the most popular formula on the market. It seems to be the best kept secret!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This formula does well for my baby
reviews.reviewText: This formula has slightly better ingredients than a lot of other formulas. My child has done well on it
